title: I'm trying to make my headphones wireless by adding a Bluetooth audio receiver. How much power does Beats pro draw? - Quora

response.answer_text: Beats Pro headphones do not draw power from the cable. They are categorized as passive devices. Quality audio equipment usually lists technical specifications. For speakers, headphones, and earphones, one of them is Sound Pressure Level (SPL) with a measure of dBm. It indicates what volume is produced by a 1 milliwatt input signal strength. The lower the number, the more amplifier output power it takes to get to a desired volume. If you search using the following search terms, you should find videos of experiments to discover the sensitivity of these headphones: beats pro headphone spl
